question: Which one of the following nitrate will decompose to give NO₂ on heating?
explanation: Alkali metal nitrates usually decompose to nitrite and oxygen (e.g., 2NaNO₃ → 2NaNO₂ + O₂).
Exception: Lithium Nitrate (LiNO₃) behaves like magnesium nitrate due to diagonal relationship/small size of Li⁺.
4LiNO₃ → 2Li₂O + 4NO₂ + O₂. It releases Brown NO₂ gas.
